Module AppointmentScheduler
Package Application.Controllers

Class ModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Application.Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ModifyCustomerController which is responsible for the logic behind ModifyCustomerView. It helps provide I/O functionality and acts as an interface between the front end GUI and backend database and provides user data validation, error handling and local cache storage for editing pre-existing Customer POJOs. It also pre-populates the GUI fields based on the previous screen's selected Customer in the Customer Table.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Michael Short

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method (inherited by Initializable) which runs automatically upon loading the controller's associated fxml file in the main application class. Initializes pre-declared table view components and links associated Part collections with their respective field properties to column categories. Uses a lambda function for filtering the country cache dataset for the correct selected item as well as filtering the divisioncache for valid options to populate based on the country.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - loads the url (automatically inherited and handled by the javafx framework)
      resourceBundle - loads the associated resourceBundle (automatically inherited and handled by the javafx framework)

    • onCancelCustomerBtn

      public void onCancelCustomerBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Event handler/listener that fires from the cancel button and redirects back to the MainMenuView screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.
      Throws:
      IOException - An exception for unintended input/output from/for the user when accepting and parsing text from the user

    • onModifyCustomerBtn

      public void onModifyCustomerBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Event handler/listener that fires from the Modify button and attempts to save and update the associated Customer with the field input to the local cache and database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.

    • onSelectCountryBtn

      public void onSelectCountryBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Event handler/listener that fires from the user selecting a country option in the Combo Box. Doing this enables the state/province Combo Box to be selectable and populates its choices according to the user's country selection.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.
      Throws:
      SQLException
